identity.title: (Recursion) Check if a string is palindrome

content.prompt: Complete the isPalindrome method so that it returns true if the string passed as the parameter is the    same if its characters are reversed.  For example, "abba" is a    palindrome, but "abbc" is not a palindrome. Important: your implementation must be recursive:    do not use a loop.     Think about what base case or cases would be appropriate.    Make sure that your recursive call or calls make progress towards    a base case.    The method should not ignore spaces, punctuation, or case    differences.  For example, "abbA" should not be considered a    palindrome.    You can use the length() method to get the length    of a string.  The charAt(int) method gets the character    at the given index in a string.  The substring(int, int)    method gets a substring from the given start index (inclusive)    to the given end index (exclusive).  A correct solution will    probably use all of these methods.
